description: Yamano Satoko is a freshman in electronics at Nekomi Institute of Technology. She`s quite attractive, even Keiichi comments that she`s one of the top five most attractive girls at Nekomi Tech. She meets Otaki when her scooter breaks down on campus and Otaki decides to help her despite the insistence of one of her suitors, that she ride his car instead.
name: Yamano Satoko
